# notificationActions

**Instance Property**

The actions associated with the current notification.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var notificationActions: [UNNotificationAction] { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this array to dynamically update the list of actions associated with a notification. You can only change this property during the [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKUserNotificationInterfaceController/didReceive(_:)] method.

## Related Documentation

- **didReceive(_:)**: Delivers a notification object to your interface controller for processing.

## Working with Actions

- **performNotificationDefaultAction()**: Launches the watchOS app and performs the current notification’s default action.
- **performDismissAction()**: Dismisses the notification interface controller.
- **dismiss()**: Dismisses the notification interface controller.
